channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sofitel plans major renovation to its New York City hotel amid 60th anniversary celebration
item.description: It’s more than just a diamond jubilee and legacy chatter these days for Accor’s Sofitel. This 60-year-old brand is just getting started with a new era...

item.title: Delta debuts premium economy between New York and LA, mixed news for elites
item.description: Delta’s premium transcontinental route between New York City and Los Angeles is getting even more premium. The Atlanta-based carrier announced Monday ...

item.title: How to maximize rewards and savings on crafting supplies
item.description: Arts and crafts are just a few of the hobbies that benefitted from the COVID-19 pandemic, with many getting a renewed interest in low-stakes DYI creat...

item.title: How to cruise with just a carry-on
item.description: One of my favorite aspects of cruising is the idea that you only have to unpack once. However, I don’t let that lure me away from my minimalist packin...
